title: Mini-Ep 47: Pardon My French
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 47: Pardon My French

description:
Kate and Doree get a voicemail from a listener with advice on self-care after getting fired, and hear from someone looking for French product recommendations. Plus, they discuss what they were doing at age 25, and share their laundry routines (or... lack thereof).

To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by:

  • Baked By Melissa - Visit bakedbymelissa.com/forever35 to sign up and use promo code forever35 to get 15% off your order.
  • Fabletics - Visit fabletics.com/forever35 to get 2 leggings for just $24 when you sign up for the VIP membership.
  • Blinkist - Visit blinkist.com/forever to start your free 7-day trial.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
